orig_text:
Each user in this example
 goes through a two-step process of signaling to gain entry into their
 conference call, which the conference focus identifies as "M".
correct_text:
Each user in this example
 goes through a two-step process of signaling to gain entry into their
 conference call, which the conference focus identifies as "M'".
notes: Both Figure 4 and the subsequent paragraphs use M'.
